commands.title: About-me
text: Hi, I'm Gabriel Stawny, a software developer with focus on performance enhancement. Currently, I'm pursuing my Computer Science degree at the Federal Technological University of Paran√° (UTFPR).

commands.title: Adaptation
text: Skilled in full stack development, crafting dynamic web apps, integrating databases and APIs.

commands.title: Tech-Skills
text: Skilled in TypeScript, Next.js, and NestJS. Well-versed in data structures, with proficiency in low-level languages.

commands.title: Creative-Optimization
text: What deeply intrigues me in focusing on performance optimization is its fusion of creativity and analytical thinking, yielding unmatched user experiences.

commands.title: Orion-Aerospace-Design
text: I'm a full stack software developer at Orion Aerospace Design, a UTFPR voluntary service. We develop software for academics, social needs, and industry partnerships, with inputs from students and professors.

commands.title: Algorithm-Monitor
text: As an Algorithm Monitor, I significantly contributed to the university by helping peers understand complex computer science concepts, improving analytical skills, and enhancing communication. This experience also facilitated connections with outstanding professors.
